mapper.select: SELECT c.*,m.nickname sendusernickname, mb.nickname writeusernickname, m.profile_img senduserprofileimg, mb.profile_img writeuserprofileimg from CHATROOM c JOIN members m on c.writeuserno = m.userno JOIN members mb on c.userno = mb.userno where (c.userno=#{userno} or writeuserno= #{userno}) and (auction_no=#{auction_no} or townlist_no=#{townlist_no})
select rownum, c.*, m.nickname, m.profile_img from chat_message C join members M on c.senduserno = m.userno where room_no = #{room_no} ORDER BY sendtime ASC

SELECT c.*,m.nickname sendusernickname ,mb.nickname writeusernickname, m.profile_img senduserprofileimg, mb.profile_img writeuserprofileimg from CHATROOM c JOIN members m on c.userno = m.userno JOIN members mb on c.writeuserno = mb.userno where (c.userno=#{userno} or c.writeuserno= #{userno}) ORDER BY sendtime DESC
SELECT m.nickname sendusernickname, mb.nickname writeusernickname from CHATROOM c JOIN members m on c.writeuserno = m.userno JOIN members mb on c.userno = mb.userno where room_no=#{roomno}
SELECT room_no,count(case when not(senduserno=#{userno}) and unread_count=1 then 1 end) unreadcount FROM CHAT_MESSAGE GROUP BY room_no HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
mapper.update: UPDATE CHAT_MESSAGE SET unread_count=0 WHERE room_no=#{roomno} and not(senduserno=#{userno})

parameterType="Map"> UPDATE chat_message SET chatcontent = #{chatcontent} WHERE ROWID IN ( SELECT rid from ( SELECT ROWID rid, rownum rn from chat_message where room_no = #{roomno} ORDER BY sendtime ASC) where rn = #{rownum})
